Format x24 - 24 bit(s) 0
CONST.S 11111010 00110000
fld_vfpu2_sem_mov_vt 3210
fld_vfpu2_sem_mov_i_imm4 3210

Assembler Syntax

CONST.S aed0..15(opnd_vfpu2_sem_mov_vt), 0..15

C Syntax

#include <xtensa/tie/xt_FP.h>

extern xtfloat XT_CONST_S(immediate b);

Description

(please consult the Xtensa ® Instruction Set Architecture Reference Manual for any cross references and additional information)

CONST.S creates a single-precision constant and places it in each half of data register frr. The constant is chosen by the value of the s field as shown in the table below.:

s Decimal Value Hex Value
0x0 +0.0 0x0000_0000
0x1 +1.0 0x3F80_0000
0x2 +2.0 0x4000_0000
0x3 +0.5 0x3F00_0000
0x4-F Reserved Reserved

Operation

For each corresponding half: 

AE_DR[r] ← table[s]

Exceptions

  • EveryInst Group
  • GenExcep(Coprocessor0Disabled) if Coprocessor Context Option

Implementation Pipeline

In Out
opnd_vfpu2_sem_mov_vt Mstage

Protos that use CONST.S

proto CONST.S { out xtfloat a, in immediate b }{}{
CONST.S a, b + 0;
}
proto DIV.S { out xtfloat vd, in xtfloat vs, in xtfloat vr }{xtfloat f0, xtfloat f1, xtfloat f2, xtfloat f22, xtfloat f3, xtfloat f4, xtfloat f5, xtfloat f55, xtfloat f6, xtfloat f7, xtfloat f8}{
DIV0.S f3, vr;
NEXP01.S f4, vr;
CONST.S f5, 1;
MADDN.S f5, f4, f3;
AE_MOV f6, f3;
AE_MOV f7, vr;
NEXP01.S f2, vs;
MADDN.S f6, f5, f6;
CONST.S f55, 1;
CONST.S f0, 0;
AE_MOV f8, f2;
MADDN.S f55, f4, f6;
MSUBN.S f0, f8, f3;
MKDADJ.S f7, vs;
MADDN.S f6, f55, f6;
MSUBN.S f8, f4, f0;
CONST.S f1, 1;
MADDN.S f1, f4, f6;
MSUBN.S f0, f8, f6;
NEG.S f22, f2;
MADDN.S f6, f1, f6;
MADDN.S f22, f4, f0;
ADDEXPM.S f0, f7;
ADDEXP.S f6, f7;
DIVN.S f0, f22, f6;
AE_MOV vd, f0;
}
proto DIV.SX2 { out xtfloatx2 vd, in xtfloatx2 vs, in xtfloatx2 vr }{xtfloatx2 f0, xtfloatx2 f1, xtfloatx2 f2, xtfloatx2 f22, xtfloatx2 f3, xtfloatx2 f4, xtfloatx2 f5, xtfloatx2 f55, xtfloatx2 f6, xtfloatx2 f7, xtfloatx2 f8}{
DIV0.S f3, vr;
NEXP01.S f4, vr;
CONST.S f5, 1;
MADDN.S f5, f4, f3;
AE_MOV f6, f3;
AE_MOV f7, vr;
NEXP01.S f2, vs;
MADDN.S f6, f5, f6;
CONST.S f55, 1;
CONST.S f0, 0;
AE_MOV f8, f2;
MADDN.S f55, f4, f6;
MSUBN.S f0, f8, f3;
MKDADJ.S f7, vs;
MADDN.S f6, f55, f6;
MSUBN.S f8, f4, f0;
CONST.S f1, 1;
MADDN.S f1, f4, f6;
MSUBN.S f0, f8, f6;
NEG.S f22, f2;
MADDN.S f6, f1, f6;
MADDN.S f22, f4, f0;
ADDEXPM.S f0, f7;
ADDEXP.S f6, f7;
DIVN.S f0, f22, f6;
AE_MOV vd, f0;
}
proto FSQRT.S { out xtfloat r, in xtfloat s }{xtbool2 b2, xtfloatx2 t0, xtfloatx2 zero, xtfloatx2 t1, xtfloatx2 t2, xtfloatx2 t3, xtfloatx2 t4, xtfloatx2 t5, xtfloatx2 t6, xtfloatx2 t7, xtfloatx2 t8}{
CONST.S zero, 0;
CONST.S t5, 1;
OEQ.S b2, s, zero;
AE_MOV t0, s;
AE_MOVT32X2 t0, t5, b2;
RSQRT0.S t1, t0;
MUL.S t2, s, t1;
CONST.S t3, 3;
MUL.S t4, t3, t1;
MSUB.S t5, t2, t1;
MADDN.S t1, t4, t5;
MUL.S t6, s, t1;
MUL.S t7, t3, t1;
CONST.S t8, 1;
MSUB.S t8, t6, t1;
MADDN.S t1, t7, t8;
MUL.S r, t1, s;
}
proto FSQRT.SX2 { out xtfloatx2 r, in xtfloatx2 s }{xtbool2 b2, xtfloatx2 t0, xtfloatx2 zero, xtfloatx2 t1, xtfloatx2 t2, xtfloatx2 t3, xtfloatx2 t4, xtfloatx2 t5, xtfloatx2 t6, xtfloatx2 t7, xtfloatx2 t8}{
CONST.S zero, 0;
CONST.S t5, 1;
OEQ.S b2, s, zero;
AE_MOV t0, s;
AE_MOVT32X2 t0, t5, b2;
RSQRT0.S t1, t0;
MUL.S t2, s, t1;
CONST.S t3, 3;
MUL.S t4, t3, t1;
MSUB.S t5, t2, t1;
MADDN.S t1, t4, t5;
MUL.S t6, s, t1;
MUL.S t7, t3, t1;
CONST.S t8, 1;
MSUB.S t8, t6, t1;
MADDN.S t1, t7, t8;
MUL.S r, t1, s;
}
proto RECIP.S { out xtfloat r, in xtfloat s }{xtfloat t1, xtfloat t2, xtfloat t3}{
RECIP0.S t1, s;
CONST.S t2, 1;
MSUB.S t2, s, t1;
MADDN.S t1, t1, t2;
CONST.S t3, 1;
MSUB.S t3, s, t1;
MADDN.S t1, t1, t3;
AE_MOV r, t1;
}
proto RECIP.SX2 { out xtfloatx2 r, in xtfloatx2 s }{xtfloatx2 t1, xtfloatx2 t2, xtfloatx2 t3}{
RECIP0.S t1, s;
CONST.S t2, 1;
MSUB.S t2, s, t1;
MADDN.S t1, t1, t2;
CONST.S t3, 1;
MSUB.S t3, s, t1;
MADDN.S t1, t1, t3;
AE_MOV r, t1;
}
proto RSQRT.S { out xtfloat r, in xtfloat s }{xtfloat t1, xtfloat t2, xtfloat t3, xtfloat t4, xtfloat t5, xtfloat t6, xtfloat t7, xtfloat t8}{
RSQRT0.S t1, s;
MUL.S t2, s, t1;
CONST.S t3, 3;
MUL.S t4, t3, t1;
CONST.S t5, 1;
MSUB.S t5, t2, t1;
MADDN.S t1, t4, t5;
MUL.S t6, s, t1;
MUL.S t7, t3, t1;
CONST.S t8, 1;
MSUB.S t8, t6, t1;
MADDN.S t1, t7, t8;
AE_MOV r, t1;
}
proto RSQRT.SX2 { out xtfloatx2 r, in xtfloatx2 s }{xtfloatx2 t1, xtfloatx2 t2, xtfloatx2 t3, xtfloatx2 t4, xtfloatx2 t5, xtfloatx2 t6, xtfloatx2 t7, xtfloatx2 t8}{
RSQRT0.S t1, s;
MUL.S t2, s, t1;
CONST.S t3, 3;
MUL.S t4, t3, t1;
CONST.S t5, 1;
MSUB.S t5, t2, t1;
MADDN.S t1, t4, t5;
MUL.S t6, s, t1;
MUL.S t7, t3, t1;
CONST.S t8, 1;
MSUB.S t8, t6, t1;
MADDN.S t1, t7, t8;
AE_MOV r, t1;
}
proto SQRT.S { out xtfloat vd, in xtfloat vs }{xtfloat f0, xtfloat f1, xtfloat f2, xtfloat f3, xtfloat f4, xtfloat f6, xtfloat f7}{
SQRT0.S f2, vs;
CONST.S f3, 0;
MADDN.S f3, f2, f2;
NEXP01.S f4, vs;
CONST.S f0, 3;
ADDEXP.S f4, f0;
MADDN.S f0, f3, f4;
NEXP01.S f3, vs;
MADDN.S f2, f0, f2;
CONST.S f0, 0;
CONST.S f6, 0;
CONST.S f7, 0;
MSUBN.S f0, f3, f2;
MADDN.S f6, f2, f4;
CONST.S f4, 3;
MADDN.S f7, f4, f2;
MADDN.S f3, f0, f0;
MADDN.S f4, f6, f2;
NEG.S f2, f7;
MADDN.S f0, f3, f2;
MADDN.S f7, f4, f7;
MKSADJ.S f2, vs;
NEXP01.S f1, vs;
MADDN.S f1, f0, f0;
NEG.S f3, f7;
ADDEXPM.S f0, f2;
ADDEXP.S f3, f2;
DIVN.S f0, f1, f3;
AE_MOV vd, f0;
}
proto SQRT.SX2 { out xtfloatx2 vd, in xtfloatx2 vs }{xtfloatx2 f0, xtfloatx2 f1, xtfloatx2 f2, xtfloatx2 f3, xtfloatx2 f4, xtfloatx2 f6, xtfloatx2 f7}{
SQRT0.S f2, vs;
CONST.S f3, 0;
MADDN.S f3, f2, f2;
NEXP01.S f4, vs;
CONST.S f0, 3;
ADDEXP.S f4, f0;
MADDN.S f0, f3, f4;
NEXP01.S f3, vs;
MADDN.S f2, f0, f2;
CONST.S f0, 0;
CONST.S f6, 0;
CONST.S f7, 0;
MSUBN.S f0, f3, f2;
MADDN.S f6, f2, f4;
CONST.S f4, 3;
MADDN.S f7, f4, f2;
MADDN.S f3, f0, f0;
MADDN.S f4, f6, f2;
NEG.S f2, f7;
MADDN.S f0, f3, f2;
MADDN.S f7, f4, f7;
MKSADJ.S f2, vs;
NEXP01.S f1, vs;
MADDN.S f1, f0, f0;
NEG.S f3, f7;
ADDEXPM.S f0, f2;
ADDEXP.S f3, f2;
DIVN.S f0, f1, f3;
AE_MOV vd, f0;
}
